mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UNIT ( UNIT_ID, BLDG_ID, RENTAL_PTY_ID, UNIT_FLR_NO, UNIT_CMAR, UNIT_XUAR, UNIT_DSR_MNTH_RENT_AMT, UNIT_DSR_SALE_AMT, UNIT_DPST_AMT, UNIT_DTL_DESC_CN, UNIT_STAT_CD ) VALUES ( #{unitId}, #{bldgId}, #{rentalPtyId}, #{unitFlrNo}, #{unitCmar}, #{unitXuar}, #{unitDsrMnthRentAmt}, #{unitDsrSaleAmt}, #{unitDpstAmt}, #{unitDtlDescCn}, #{unitStatCd} )
mapper.select: SELECT U.*, B.BLDG_NM, B.BLDG_IMG_PATH, T.RENTAL_PTY_BIZ_REG_FILE_PATH, T.RENTAL_PTY_REG_BLDG_CNT, T.RENTAL_PTY_ACCT_NO, T.RENTAL_PTY_BIZ_REG_NO, T.RENTAL_PTY_FILE, T.RENTAL_PTY_FILE2, T.LSR_YN_TYPE_CD, T.RENTAL_PTY_BANK_NM, T.LSR_TYPE_GROUP_CD FROM UNIT U JOIN BUILDING B ON U.BLDG_ID = B.BLDG_ID JOIN TENANCY T ON U.RENTAL_PTY_ID = T.RENTAL_PTY_ID WHERE U.BLDG_ID = #{bldgId} ORDER BY U.UNIT_ID ASC

SELECT U.*, B.BLDG_NM, B.BLDG_IMG_PATH, T.RENTAL_PTY_BIZ_REG_FILE_PATH, T.RENTAL_PTY_REG_BLDG_CNT, T.RENTAL_PTY_ACCT_NO, T.RENTAL_PTY_BIZ_REG_NO, T.RENTAL_PTY_FILE, T.RENTAL_PTY_FILE2, T.LSR_YN_TYPE_CD, T.RENTAL_PTY_BANK_NM, T.LSR_TYPE_GROUP_CD FROM UNIT U JOIN BUILDING B ON U.BLDG_ID = B.BLDG_ID JOIN TENANCY T ON U.RENTAL_PTY_ID = T.RENTAL_PTY_ID WHERE U.UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
mapper.update: UPDATE UNIT SET BLDG_ID = #{bldgId}, RENTAL_PTY_ID = #{rentalPtyId}, UNIT_FLR_NO = #{unitFlrNo}, UNIT_CMAR = #{unitCmar}, UNIT_XUAR = #{unitXuar}, UNIT_DSR_MNTH_RENT_AMT = #{unitDsrMnthRentAmt}, UNIT_DSR_SALE_AMT = #{unitDsrSaleAmt}, UNIT_DPST_AMT = #{unitDpstAmt}, UNIT_DTL_DESC_CN = #{unitDtlDescCn}, UNIT_STAT_CD = #{unitStatCd} WHERE UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
